attributes.action: order councils, in consultation with communities, to turn off street lights in as many areas as it is practical, to cut the waste of electricity that contributes to global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of us would really appreciate a time of night not spoiled by light pollution. Many places in the UK could do without their street lights for  a protracted length of time at night and with the agreements of the local communities we could all benefit.
